text: Frank Bank (April 12, 1942 - April 13, 2013)entry at TV Series Finale was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Clarence "Lumpy" Rutherford on the situation comedy television series Leave It to Beaver. Bank was born on April 12, 1942 in Los Angeles, California. He died on April 13, 2013 from unknown causes, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1942 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors
title: Frank Bank
